price: (14) Then they turned away from him and said, "[He was] taught [and is] a madman."
arabic: ثُمَّ تَوَلَّوۡاْ عَنۡهُ وَقَالُواْ مُعَلَّمٞ مَّجۡنُونٌ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: thumma tawallaw ʿanhu waqālū muʿallamun majnūnun
